alert.note: Alert for Central Elko County; Eastern Elko County; White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 13 at 1:37AM PDT until July 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 425, 469, AND 470... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry lightning, which is in effect from 8 AM this morning to 11 PM PDT this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 425 White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties, Fire Weather Zone 469 Central Elko County and Fire Weather Zone 470 Eastern Elko County. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Thunderstorm Coverage...Isolated dry thunderstorms are expected to develop across zones 425, 469 and 470 during the afternoon and early evening Wednesday. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions. Dry lightning may create new fire starts and combine with strong outflow winds to produce rapid fire growth.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of dry lightning, strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Elko County; Eastern Elko County; White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties
